author: Jordan Pearson, Jason Koebler
title: Conspiracies Are Thriving on Anti-Lockdown Protest Facebook Pages
description: Misinformation and conspiracies about the deadly virus have found a home on groups and pages planning and promoting anti-lockdown protests on the social network.
content:
In the face of lockdowns, business closures, and shelter-in-place orders designed to slow the spread of Covid-19 and save lives, some Americans are protesting for their right to spread a deadly virus in order to keep the economy moving.
